text: this is Adam elet for the New York Times
Don is a dream for everyone I was
invited to an Afghan wedding in Kabul
it is that the did the night that have
fun man the dreams country it's a lot of
food
more than 95% of marriages here are
arranged and this one was no different
like the West to have a girlfriend or
boyfriend to no woman spend some times
with them and then after that decide to
get married different indeed 1,100 men
and 0 women and a few armed guests for
the first 90 minutes stoic men sat
around tables at one point my Afghan
friend turned to me and said Adam this
is our life but then one guest helped
pick up the vibe
after three decades of war Afghanistan
has more than a million disabled people
that too is part of an Afghan wedding
but hardly enough to subdue this
